events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The system has categorized this case under 'Refund' based on the customer's message mentioning a refund request.
This case has been assigned to agent John Smith for further handling of the refund request.
Hello! I'm John from customer support. I understand you want a refund due to receiving the wrong item. Let's get this sorted out quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so I can verify the issue and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and I've attached a photo showing the item that arrived. It was not what I ordered.
Thanks for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and provide you with a prepaid label to return the incorrect item.
Thank you for handling this so quickly. I appreciate you providing the return label and refund process.
Your refund has been processed and you will receive the amount on your original payment method within 5 business days.
We are following up to ensure you have received your refund and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
As there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
